p: In the study, five different gelatine and casein-based diets were prepared containing royal jelly in the ratios of D1 (%0,00), D2 (%0,10), D3 (%0,40), D4 (%1,60) and D5 (%6,40). Materials used in diets; jelatin (G2500-1KG), casein (C3400-1KG SIGMA), dextrin (MP-901520), L-arginine (MP-194626), L-methionine (MP-194707), L-lysine (MP-194696), choline chloride (MP-101386), carboxymethyl cellulose sodium salt (CMC), mineral mixture were supplied from Mp-Bio company, and vitamin mixture was supplied from Mp biomedical company as a mixture from Roche in determined proportions ( Table 2).
